title: Textile, 1960s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: narrow-woven bands, pieced with embroidery stitching, printed with stamps carved from calabash (adinkira)
dimensions: Overall: 343 x 226 cm (11 ft. 3 1/16 in. x 7 ft. 5 in.)
description: Six strips of bright red cotton stamp-printed in dark brown/black in a variety of geometric symbols. The strips are joined by embroidery patterned in bands of black, blue, green, and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1960s. Medium: cotton
Technique: narrow-woven bands, pieced with embroidery stitching, printed with stamps carved from calabash (adinkira). 1969-7-1.
